name: Arcana (itch)
description:
Arcana is a simple party-based roguelike for 7DRL 2018.

Features
  • ASCII graphics
  • Turn-based gameplay
  • AI party members (up to 3)
  • 4 character races (human, elf, dwarf, halfling)
  • 4 character classes (fighter, rogue, mage, priest)
  • 3 procedurally generated levels (forests, dungeons, caves)
  • Procedurally generated names and quests
Planned features
  • Advanced classes and class change
  • Crafting system
  • Town building
  • Unique skills and spells
  • Set items
How to Play
  • Tavern - you can recruit party members and receive quests here.
  • Adventure's Inn - your party can level up with rest after gaining experience.
  • General Store - you can buy and sell equipment or identify unknown items.
  • Temple - you can cure a bad status and resurrect a dead party member here. but a resurrection can fail.
  • Leave town - start an adventure!
